name: (Not So) Casual Platformer
description:
Just a simple little endless platformer game I made in a week to further improve my unity skills. Very happy with how it turned out and learned quite a bit from it. 

Controls are simple, A/D to move left and right respectively, Space is to jump. Collect the gold cubes as you ascend to further increase your score which will be revealed at the end. I wonder who will get the highest?

While it does have (Not So) in it's name, that's more of a joke than anything as it sounded really funny.
